configurable.i18n_description: This cropped, pale pink sweatshirt from 7 For all Mankind’s women’s collection is the ultimate in understated cool. The sweatshirt is effortlessly cool with a cropped rolled hem and exposed side zips, adding refined definition. The pale pink sweatshirt has an unexpected edge with ultra feminine appeal.
configurable.i18n_description_de: Dieses Cropped Sweatshirt in Blassrosa aus A very expensive brands Damenkollektion setzt in Sachen dezente Coolness ultimative Akzente. Dieses Sweatshirt mit kurzem, eingerolltem Saum ist absolut lässig und die sichtbaren Seitenreißverschlüsse setzen einen edlen Akzent. Dieses blassrosa Sweatshirt überzeugt mit unerwarteter Raffinesse und ultraweiblichem Flair.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: Dit korte lichtroze sweatshirt uit A very expensive brand's damescollectie is simpel en relaxed. Met zijn omgerolde boorden en zichtbare ritsen aan de zijkant is dit shirt moeiteloos cool en origineel. De zachtroze tint zorgt voor een verrassend vrouwelijk effect.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Ce sweat-shirt rose pâle à coupe courte femme de 7 For all Mankind incarne décontraction et sobriété. Ce sweat-shirt a un style décontracté facile à vivre, il arbore revers aux manches et fermetures latérales zippées raffinées. Ce sweat-shirt rose pâle a un style tendance inattendu et une allure ultraféminine.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Felpa A very expensive brand rosa chiaro taglio cropped, l'ultima tendenza in fatto di stile informale e cool. Il taglio cropped con risvolto e le zip laterali a vista aggiungono una nota di carattere. Incredibilmente trendy e ultra femminile.
configurable.i18n_description_es: Esta sudadera corta en rosa pálido de la colección para mujer de 7 For all Mankind es la prenda ideal para lucir un estilo cool y discreto. Ponte esta sudadera corta para lucir un aire despreocupado gracias al bajo dado vuelta y a las cremalleras laterales a la vista que le añaden personalidad. La sudadera rosa pálido con su look sorprendente irradia femineidad.
configurable.i18n_product_details:
• Measurements may vary based on size, fabric and wash
  • 66% Polyamide 33% Cotton 5% Lyocell
  • Made in Europe using original and handcrafted finishing techniques

configurable.i18n_product_details_es:
